feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.18.4.9674
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • b0bfbe767c515c37565094663f84aa2155a7461d Add MediaInfo AudioLanguagesAll and update styling
  • 528b93dabe5df8811a11a6d0dc28bdaa2721393d Fixed: Format bitrate for primary streams in media info
  • 1edcbee5e134da296e34f27441010288b07ad6c9 Bump version to 5.18.4
  • 8853dced9fecc1d8c92163ae532352a44268d3d5 Fixed: Health warning for downloading inside root folders
  • c7aa1bae5e06cd834e096141c70a86f8bebca0ca Fixed: Ignore special folders inside Blackhole watch folders
  • 405ae77070754b55dd842c9d053da2a134cfb426 New: Prefer newer Usenet releases
  • 6236bc9b4f4d8fb208d920314d46630a50fd5147 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 743c977e5b242bb68e658c2ba9dba609cd00e86b New: Refresh cache for tracked queue on movies update
  • c0e5646f07014c9544d0288f7dcb6f1f15b69697 Bump Polly and NLog.Layouts.ClefJsonLayout
  • 10094b4e6613331af4bcb2b129338b27b741426f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • d923406f0850214d1ee11f8db05e220ce849a74b Bump version to 5.18.3
See More * 69a9c7228666ff8f394b27309ec438f0ed3b98f5 Fixed: Loading movies with duplicated translations * 55b9477a017b9a5eb72112eeb04653ef065535b7 Fixed: Cleanup duplicated movie translations * 6b81f92137a3a5c70aea293df023eae85a443f80 Fixed: Import Movies page crashing on `console.error` with non-string values * 3ceda1bcdafd81971ee33f034d955cd4b92de97c New: Parse releases with JPN as Japanese and KOR as Korean * f1f19215177c59d3d3b153165039eba91ade35fc Update Trakt ratings logo (#10822) * af0c96538a1a7837b61dfed6a72cc775185557e5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * languages for releases with MULTI and other languages (#10842) * b452c10da34603e6e640b19df675ab932849be04 Bump SonarCloud azure extension for UI analysis to 3.X * f6b364725d8357ecf673fa77a39b32967c243149 Additional logging for delay profile decisions [ #10831 ] * 99f6be3f3dd71004d4956c5db6652adc44256eeb New: Show release source in history grab details [ #10830 ] * c2ac49a8735940bb42a7a85b3bff7764f8c954fa Additional logging for custom format score [ #10828 ] * 0e24a3e8bc1a8dbd3b3916b258cc67153a752c53 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 18032cc83bfbcc67cd0f3c14ba493f4946707286 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 927eb389455db4d2a878d1b8452eac039be0f6a0 Bump version to 5.18.1 * 5fac3486130df3b316dd882d676ca13ecb697b59 Bump SonarCloud azure extension to 3.X * 7ba9603449252f24fa99c47aef4706e1b52b3c1d Fixed: Sending Discord notifications with images without absolute links * e36de8ab8d9630ab542268ee5b870af2945a70b0 New: Auto tag based on movie status * f8704a16557669aa56f1eb8578ee2a935b59721d Translate backend: Autotagging + CF specs [ #9647 ] * f507d5154ec162df11c17d65c3f1d73b6cbe0c2e Fixed: Listening on all IPv4 Addresses * 5f03e7142a24a73b14ad9b7aa059f14d87e5ffa8 Fixed: qBittorrent Ratio Limit Check * c0ebbee7c93322c26a4498b3affcd79474afa087 Bump version to 5.18.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=153&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.19.3.9730
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 36c66deb4b345880e64949132227d8483fc71e7c Recommend against using uTorrent
  • edec432244933a2143c5d13c71de7eb210434e7b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 554e15d438512e50e7fc22bd68d45d7b4610fb7f New: Watch list sorting and rate limit for Trakt Import Lists
  • 553645a07c4f70b45b0b0f5533f1feab2b719d42 Bump version to 5.19.2
  • 7de7e83c5bd136bf5fdbf78746e734f07969ab81 New: Add Blu-ray link to movie details
  • b7a46bedb036f6e57a2f2d043ddcbd1659fea82d Fixed: Avoid checking for free space if other specifications fail first
  • 0925769377e79dca436de2763d2f902b6e90f0c4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 72244362feedf632d2173339177908aaa2cb65d8 Automated API Docs update
  • c6526c34e97e40bf3a5ccaa62f0db6649c6b89e0 Cleanse console log messages
  • efa2913dbc72fc1baadd534c1eabdf479958d117 Translate Trakt popular list types

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.20.2.9777
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.21.1.9799
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.22.4.9896
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 981a3c2db392099394c4c0b7c182b190877ae3f1 Fixed: Selecting No Change for quality profile inputs
